login.title: Login
login.SubTitle: Enter your details and start your day with us!
login.button.name: Login

register.title: Sign Up
register.SubTitle: Enter your email and join us!
register.errorNotFound: sorry the email you entered does not correspond to any of our customers.
register.connectionFailed: connection failed please check you internet connection
register.button.name: Register

AddPassword.successMessage.title: Success Message
AddPassword.successMessage.body: The link has been sent, please check your email to confirm your registration
AddPassword.EchecMessage.title: Echec Message
AddPassword.EchecMessage.body: connection failed please check you internet connection
AddPassword.button.name: confirm
AddPassword.note.title: Note:
AddPassword.note.body: Password must have at least one non alphanumeric character, one uppercase and at least one digit.

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.button.name: submit
ForgotPassword.successMessage.title: Success Message
ForgotPassword.successMessage.body: The link has been sent, please check your email to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.EchecMessage.title: Echec Message
ForgotPassword.EchecMessage.body: connection failed please check you internet connection
ForgotPassword.ErrorMessage: operation failed enter a valid email!

connectionFailed: connection failed please check you internet connection
